div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2292 Sulcis (mod. S. Antioco), 60 km. WSW of Cagliari, Sardinia, 1874 Burial: 212 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: AE Carthage: Sardinian mint (as SNGCop. 387 and other types) Roman Rep.: 1 libral as Disposition: unknown Spano, BAS 1858, p. 67, note 5 Crawford, RRCH 46
